org.helm.notation.tools
Class SimpleNotationParser

java.lang.Object
  org.helm.notation.tools.SimpleNotationParser

public class SimpleNotationParser
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides methods that handle simple polymer notation. It is unlikely that they will be called by clients directly.

Author:
zhangtianhong

getNucleotideList

public static java.util.List<Nucleotide> getNucleotideList(java.lang.String polymerNotation,
                                                           boolean validate)
                                                    throws NotationException,
                                                           MonomerException,
                                                           java.io.IOException,
                                                           org.jdom.JDOMException,
                                                           StructureException
This methods returns the nucleotide list for RNA polymer type. Validation of polymer notation could be slow

Parameters:
polymerNotation - - simple RNA polymer notation
validate - - true will run structure validation, false will not run structure validation.
Returns:
Nucleotide list
Throws:
NotationException
MonomerException
java.io.IOException
org.jdom.JDOMException
StructureException

getStrictNucleotideList

public static java.util.List<Nucleotide> getStrictNucleotideList(java.lang.String polymerNotation,
                                                                 boolean validate)
                                                          throws NotationException,
                                                                 MonomerException,
                                                                 java.io.IOException,
                                                                 org.jdom.JDOMException,
                                                                 StructureException
getNucleotideList is a more forgiving function that will try to substitute the natural sequence where possible to provide information for queries. This getStrictNucleotideList routine is more strict in that it will utilize modX for a natural seuqence X or include ? for unknown bases.

Parameters:
polymerNotation -
validate -
Returns:
list of nucleotide
Throws:
NotationException
MonomerException
java.io.IOException
org.jdom.JDOMException
StructureException

getMoleculeInfo

public static MoleculeInfo getMoleculeInfo(java.lang.String notation,
                                           java.lang.String polymerType)
                                    throws NotationException,
                                           MonomerException,
                                           java.io.IOException,
                                           org.jdom.JDOMException,
                                           chemaxon.marvin.plugin.PluginException,
                                           StructureException
This method returns the MoleculeInfo of simple polymer using a divide and conquer approach

Parameters:
notation - - simple notation
polymerType - - RNA, PEPTIDE or CHEM
Returns:
MoleculeInfo of this simple polymer, all R groups are capped.
Throws:
NotationException
MonomerException
java.io.IOException
org.jdom.JDOMException
chemaxon.marvin.plugin.PluginException
StructureException

preprocessChemNode

protected static java.lang.String preprocessChemNode(java.lang.String nodeDesc)
                                              throws NotationException
This method preprocess the CHEMCHEM monomer node. Monomer could be predefined or added ad hoc which the system will generate an ID, and add to monomer factory

Parameters:
nodeDesc - - in the format of ID or extended smiles
Returns:
monomer alternateID
Throws:
